responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "A83D0D304964737453E910ABF98D10E2", "At first, I assumed she was hunting and began to earnestly apologize for startling her quarry, but I fell silent when she raised a hand that grasped a small brass orrery, clicking and whirring as it spun in rapid circles. She held the device up, facing the direction in which the mist-kirin had retreated. Its rotation immediately slowed, then stopped, and she fell to her knees with a frustrated sigh.\"Months wasted,\" she grumbled. \"Now I\'ll have to start all over again.\" She tugged open a leather satchel at her hip and carefully packed the device into it. Looking up at me with undisguised disappointment, I thought I might have seen a tear in her eye. I fell silent, awkward with guilt, unable to think of a thing to say. I was sorry for having startled her prey, but something else was bothering me. While I\'d never seen a living kirin, I had read about them many times, and I didn\'t recall anything about them having the ability to intentionally wield Essence.\"I understand,\" she said, sensing my confusion. \"You had no way of knowing.\" She drew in a long breath and exhaled heavily, relieving much of the tension in her posture.")
name: DD_Ambient_TotH3_A_37
